page.title: 04Fenland Farm.
page.content: This is a medium-sized family- owned fenland siltland farm of grade I agricultural land, producing potatoes, sugar beet, vining peas, onions, veg (i.e.cauliflower, cabbage and savoy) and wheat. We are a member of Lincolnshire Marketing Organisation which is a farmer owned Co-op for grading and selling potatoes and onions. We are also a member of Portland Pea Growers producing 450 acres of vining peas of which we grow 35 acres. Part of the vining acreage is followed by Japenese onions, harvested in July and immediately followed by savoys which are cut in February and followed by potatoes - this gives three crops in 2 years. We have 3 workers (1 part-time), six tractors, one fork-lift and a combine harvester. George Sly.
